compounddef.title: First assignment Research Track course - second module - actions branch

listitem.para:
Index:
General Instructions
Launch the node
Additional docuementation

sect1.title: General Instructions
sect1.para: This branch contains the same package of the action branch, but the documentation is done using Sphinx. In addition a Jupyter notebook is being added in the notebook folder in order to implement a GUI to better and easily control the robot in the simulation.

sect1.title: Launch the node
sect1.para: To launch the node, please run: roslaunchrt2_assignment1action_branch.launch
Once the nodes are launched start the Jupyter notebook in order to use the enhanced interface for controlling the robot

sect1.title: Additional documentation
sect1.para: can be found opening the index.html file in the docs folder
